sourcesContent:
import { Component, HostListener } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-darkmode', templateUrl: './darkmode.component.html', styleUrls: ['./darkmode.component.css'] }) export class DarkmodeComponent { darkMode:boolean=false; @HostListener('window:keydown.control.d',['$event']) switchdark(event:KeyboardEvent){ this.darkMode=!this.darkMode; } } Document
